caption.p: Synthesis of 2-amino-5-substituted-4-carboxylic acid derivatives (12a–16a) and 2-amido-5-substituted-4-carboxylate/carboxylic acid derivatives (12 b, 14 b and 14c). Reagents and conditions: (i) NaOCH 3, ether, 0 °C, stirring, 5 h; (ii) thiourea, methanol, reflux, 3 h; (iii) NaOH, H 2O, stirring, 5 h; (iv) R 2COCl, tretrahydrofuran (THF), stirring, room temperature, 5 h; (v) NaOH, H 2O, stirring, overnight.
